name: Vocalingo
description:
Vocalingo Learn vocabulary passively!

This is an educational application to place on a second monitor, have it run as background with different themes each having between 50-100 words to remember.

The goal is not to study each of them but to look once in a while at the application and remember passively these words.

I speak french and english but I want to improve my german, I remember the words but I have a hard time to write them down. After playing at Abzu, the idea came to me to make this application with the assets I own from the asset store and put it on itch.io to have an easier access to the app from my work pc to my personal pc.

Now if you want to use the app for you and leave it run feel free! I will update with more "world" once in a while (It will just depend on the assets I have).

Spacebar to jump to the next word

(but that's not the intended way to use the app, just a debug for me to check the words)

Disclaimer 1

Eventhough spanish is in here already, the translations are not correct. If you want to help me translate the spanish words feel free to reach me out per email: antoinefauville@gmail.com

Disclaimer 2

I made this application only for the learning purpose.

I was inspired by the abzu temples (video game) and made this application to have it run on my second monitor while I work so I can "passively" learn vocabulary.

I used bought asset packs from the asset store. I have no intention to earn money from this application. I just used Itch.io as a web browser app host to have an easy access to my application.

Any content that might refer to an other language learning application are pure coincidence or intentionaly parodied as a joke (such as the ricarduolingo birb).
